title:
Remote React/React Native Developer Independiente
Remoto
description:
Join the world’s largest
virtual company!

Work from anywhere –
Flexible hours – Training & travel opportunities
 

Scopic
Software is seeking a Remote React/React
Native Developer to join our team of 250+ professionals across 40
countries. We are looking for a proactive programmer, who doesn’t shy away from
complex problems. The successful candidate will work with other advanced
software engineers on multiple project teams to build industry-leading applications
for our clients.

 

At
Scopic, we believe great developers can be found in every corner of the globe,
and talent shouldn’t be limited by location. Our
employees work in nearly every time zone, from whenever they feel most
comfortable, and our software benefits from this diversity of perspectives and
expertise.
 
Develop
Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your Success
All Scopic projects involve working with challenging, innovative
applications. When you work with us, you will not just be maintaining old code
or wasting time on applications that will never see the light of day. The
applications Scopic develops are the cornerstone of our clients’ businesses.
Clients and users will rely on you to write quality code and keep mission-critical
applications running optimally.
 
Grow Your
Skills and Your Career, Fast
We offer training opportunities to keep your skills sharp and
encourage you to stay up-to-date with ever-evolving technologies. As your
skills grow, you will have opportunities to move up in the company. If you work
hard and deliver quality results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and
promotions are completely merit-based, so your success is in your hands.
 
Become a
Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International Team
Unlike huge tech corporations like Google and Microsoft, Scopic
employees don’t get lost in bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring
tasks day after day. Most projects last six months to one year, so our
developers have the opportunity to try their skills on a diverse range of
applications. Scopic programmers work independently and are entrusted with
considerable responsibility.
 
Why Work With Scopic Software?


?       
Flexible working hours, set your own schedule
?       
Freedom to travel and work from anywhere in the world
?       
Ability to work wherever you are most comfortable (home, office,
park, café, etc.)
?       
Reliable, consistent workload
?       
Flexible payment options in $US – salaried and hourly positions
available
?       
Annual pay increases for good performance
?       
Paid training and other professional growth opportunities
?       
All-expenses-paid international travel opportunities
?       
Interesting, challenging projects using the latest technologies


 
Requirements:


?       
2+
years of experience in software development
?       
Strong
JavaScript skills, including ES6/ES7 and Typescript
?       
Experience
developing at least one substantial React Native mobile application
?       
Experience
with both IOS and Android platforms
?       
Proficiency
working with Firebase or similar mobile backend services
?       
Experience
working with React/Redux in commercial applications
?       
Good
HTML5/CSS3 skills
?       
Back-end
experience with Node.js, C#/.Net or PHP is a plus.
?       
Good
English reading and writing skills
?       
Bachelor’s
degree or higher


 
 
This is a full-time
position.
 
Salary:
Depending on skills and experience. 
Please apply online:  
https://scopicsoftware.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk03i8e?source=Emplea%20DO

  
About Scopic Software
Scopic Software is the world’s largest virtual company. Founded in
2006, we have grown consistently by delivering innovative, cutting-edge
software products for our clients and creating an empowering environment for
our employees.
 
We build advanced software
for clients and users around the globe. With 10+ years in the industry and
1000+ projects under our belt, we’ve developed software for Manufacturing,
Media and Entertainment, Fintech, Healthcare, Food and Fitness, and Gaming.
Check out our development work on our portfolio: scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/.
 
Learn more about career opportunities at Scopic: scopicsoftware.com/careers.

title: IT QA Analyst Tiempo Completo
description:
QA Analyst
 
One Park Dominicana
(“OPD”) is looking for a successful, energetic and goal-oriented QA Analyst to
join our growing team. We are looking for a QA Analyst to support our efforts
of testing our CRM among other applications. 
 
Essential
Duties & Responsibilities
 

Working with
     team members to ensure all requirements are delivered and tested in an
     efficient, highly productive manner.
Participate in
     stand-up daily SCRUM meeting to provide status of the current testing.
Read/Write
     manual test cases.
Read/Write
     automated test cases.
Report new applications
     defects and log them in the Bug’s database (Jira).
Develop a high
     level of confidence in delivered applications through verifying and
     validating it.
Experience In
     analyzing Requirements and translate that into Test Plans.

 
 
Minimum
Qualifications
 

Minimum of 1 years as a QA, or related areas
Basic Knowledge Of Object Oriented Programming
Knowledge of bugs-tracking tools(such as Jira)
Experience integrating with 3rd party APIS 
Familiar with SDLC and Agile Methodologies

·        
Posses good level of English:
·        
You Must be able to read/communicate effectively
 
 
 
 
 
 
Desired
Skills and Experience

Self-motivated,
     organized, team player with excellent oral and written communication
     skills and exceptional attention to detail
Effectively
     document results of activities that improve quality, efficiency and
     productivity of the Quality Assurance Team
Understanding
     of User stories, Issues, and Bug's life-cycle
Salesforce Certified Administrator Or
     knowledge of the Salesforce ecosystem

·        
Previous experience working in a SCRUM or agile
environment preferred

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline
Willing to Learn Fast to improve company’s objective

 
 
OPF is an
Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE) and takes great pride in building a diverse
work environment. Qualified applicants are considered for employment without
regard to age, race, religion, gender, national origin, sexual orientation,
disability or veteran status.

title:
Remote UX Designer Medio tiempo
Remoto
description:
Start a career with the world’s largest virtual company!

Work from anywhere – Flexible hours – Training & travel opportunities
 
Are you a creative professional passionate about user-centric design? Do you excel at designing engaging, crystal clear workflows?
 
Scopic Software is seeking a UX Designer to join our team of 250+ professionals across 40 countries. At Scopic, we believe great developers can be found in every corner of the globe, and talent shouldn’t be limited by location. Our employees work in nearly every time zone, from whenever they feel most comfortable, and our software benefits from this diversity of perspectives and expertise.
 
We are looking for an experienced designer with creative problem solving skills and a proactive attitude. The right candidate will work with a team of advanced software engineers, QAs, and marketing specialists to analyze business objectives and optimize UX/UI design accordingly.
 
Grow Your Skills and Your Career, Fast
We offer training opportunities to keep your skills sharp and encourage you to stay up-to-date with ever-evolving technologies. As your skills grow, you will have opportunities to move up in the company. If you work hard and deliver quality results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and promotions are completely merit-based, so your success is in your hands.
 
Become a Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International Team
Unlike huge tech corporations like Google and Microsoft, Scopic employees don’t get lost in bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring tasks day after day. Our designers have the opportunity to try their skills on a diverse range of applications. Scopic designers work independently and are entrusted with considerable responsibility.
 
Design Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your Success
All Scopic projects are challenging, innovative applications. When you work with us, you will not just be fixing up outdated designs or wasting time on applications that will never see the light of day. The applications Scopic produces are the cornerstone of our clients’ businesses. Clients will rely on you to design beautiful, intuitive web and mobile apps that keep users coming back.
 
Why Work With Scopic Software?
·         Flexible working hours, ability to set your own schedule
·         Freedom to travel and work from anywhere in the world
·         Ability to work wherever you are most comfortable (home, office, park, café, etc.)
·         Reliable, consistent workload
·         Flexible payment options – salaried and hourly positions available
·         Annual pay increases for good performance
·         Paid training and other professional growth opportunities
·         International travel opportunities (not required)
·         Interesting, challenging projects using the latest technologies
 
Requirements

3+ years of commercial UI/graphics design experience
Experience with UI and graphics design for web, mobile, and marketing
Experience using Material Design, Fluent, or similar design system
Excellent UX and conceptual design skills
Ability to discuss requirements with clients and implement their ideas
Versatile, resourceful, and interdisciplinary design skills
Experience with typography, color themes/palettes, and pixel perfect graphics
Ability to work with a team and contribute to discussions
Working knowledge of Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch, and at least one wire-framing tool (e.g. Figma, UXPin, Balsamic, InVision, MarvelApp)
Bachelors degree or higher
Strong written and spoken English communication skills
Stable internet connection and home computer

 
Applicants must submit a strong design portfolio for this position.
 
Salary: Depending on skills and experience. Employees are paid monthly via wire transfer.

with SharePoint administration.

title: AI Instructor (Part Time) Medio tiempo
description: AI Instructor (Part Time)Fusemachines is on a mission to democratize AI by making AI education globally accessible. While there is a worldwide shortage of AI talent, the education & training efforts to combat this shortage is focused more on the developed world. In the developing world, the training in AI is fragmented across regions and is not uniform. Fusemachines has been addressing this challenge utilizing its in-house expertise and deep industry knowledge. Since 2016, Fusemachines has trained hundreds of students in AI across Nepal, Dominican Republic, Rwanda, Burkina Faso through its Fusemachines AI Fellowship program and the fuse.ai program including Columbia University’s MicroMasters curriculum.  Our goal is to close the existing opportunity gap by providing access to high-level training in AI. We are bringing original AI training content and are using in-house industry engineers to effectively train to meet the global AI requirements.We are looking for passionate educators and practical problem solvers with demonstrated flexibility and curiosity.  Join us in our mission to democratize AI!DescriptionDeliver lectures and tutorials on scientific Python, SQL, probability, statistics (Bayesian and frequentist), machine learning, and data engineering.Lead day-long “sprints,” maintaining a strong presence in the classroom and managing other instructional staff.Deftly and patiently field student questions and provide feedback in lectures and office hours.Build and refine data science curriculum and assignments.Utilize student feedback and experimentation to continuously improve teaching and assessment methods.Evaluate new tools, packages, and tutorials for use in the curriculum.Contribute to local AI awareness, admissions, and nurture activities, such as attendance at meetups, speaking at conferences, leading workshops (day time and/or evening).Expected Experience: Multiple years of experience in industry in a Data Scientist or Software Engineer roleMaster's (PhD is a plus) in a quantitative discipline such as engineering, statistics, or mathematicsStrong understanding in the topics we teach: scientific Python, probability, statistics (Probability, A/B Testing, Bayesian methods, Regression methods, Time Series, SQL, Machine Learning (Decision Trees, Random Forest, Boosting, Support Vector Machines, Clustering, Natural Language Processing, Recommenders, Graphs), Data Visualization (d3), and data at scale. Multiple years of experience teaching a quantitative subject strongly preferredFusemachines provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status.

title:
Ingeniero de Software Web Tiempo Completo
Remoto
description:
Quiénes somos
Soluciones GBH es una empresa con divisiones especializadas en
tecnología de información, asesoría estratégica y ejecución de mercadeo, así
como el desarrollo de productos web, móviles y big data. Nuestro objetivo es
colocar a la República Dominicana en la lista de países donde se desarrollen
productos innovadores y realicen operaciones nearshore, utilizando las
capacidades características de su población: ingenio, capacidad técnica,
comunicación y excelente trato humano.
Qué buscamos
(1) Ing. de Software Móvil Senior (US$ <18/hora)
(2) Ing. de Software Web Senior (US$ <18/hora)
Descripción
El Ingeniero de Software Senior trabaja produciendo código de pruebas y
ejecución para diversos proyectos de clientes externos..
Objetivos
? Producir código de ejecución y de pruebas.
? Colaborar en el diseño y la arquitectura de los proyectos.
? Ser el mentor de los ingenieros mobile junior y
mid-level.
 Requisitos
1. Egresado de grado universitario en ingeniería de sistemas y
computación o carrera relacionada, con 3+ años de experiencia desarrollando
aplicaciones móviles de tipo empresarial. 
2. Debe poder construir soluciones haciendo uso de estructuras de datos
simples o complejas. Por ejemplo: arreglos, listas enlazadas, stacks, queues,
graphs y trees.
3. Conocimiento y capacidad de aplicación de object oriented design;
esta persona debe, dado un problema, poder estructurar su solución en clases,
métodos y propiedades.
4. Para la vacante Mobile, debe demostrar que entiende cómo funciona una
aplicación movil y como esta se integra con servicios externos o de terceros.
Cualquier capacidad demostrada en las tecnologías representadas en estos
keywords es un plus: Android, iOS, React Native, Xamarin, Unity3D, Ionic
5. Para la vacante Web, debe demostrar que entiende cómo funciona una
aplicación web y como esta se integra con servicios externos o de terceros. Cualquier
capacidad demostrada en las tecnologías representadas en estos keywords es un
plus: Reactjs, Nodejs Angularjs, Python o Elixir. 
6. Conocimientos sobre estrategias de testing top down y bottom up así
cómo su implementación a través de unit testing y/o integration testing un
plus.
7. Acostumbrado a utilizar herramientas de control de versiones (GIT) un
plus.
8. Buen dominio del inglés; esta persona debe poder leer libros,
documentos técnicos o posts de blogs y comprenderlos. Adicionalmente, debe poder
generar un resumen de dicha lectura y mantener una conversación técnica sobre
el tema sin dificultad.
Igualdad de oportunidades
El proceso de selección para el presente puesto garantiza el
cumplimiento del principio de No-Discriminación por sexo, origen (incluido el
racial o étnico), edad, estado civil, discapacidad, religión o convicciones,
opinión política, orientación sexual, afiliación sindical, condición social y
lengua.
Condiciones de contratación
? Contrato como prestador de servicios por 1 año. Posibilidad de
extensión antes de finalizar cada periodo.
? Modalidad de trabajo remota. 40 horas semanales garantizadas con
posibilidad de realizar horas extras en caso de ser requeridas por el cliente.
? Salario por hora de U$ 15-18 (según experiencia).

and system diagnostic skills.

writing and executing scripts, PowerShell and other scripting languages.

application performance issues and engage Help Desk or IT Support as needed, to

and thinking laterally as part of a team, or individually, to meet the needs of

response.

title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER II (Full Stack PHP Senior Developer) Tiempo Completo
description:
¿Por qué trabajar para OMD Dominicana? Tenemos un ambiente prospero para el desarrollo profesional en ingeniería de software. Utilizamos  tecnologías avanzadas en el desarrollo de proyectos de nuestros clientes (Big Data, Inteligencia Artificial, etc.) otros de los beneficios que tendras con nosotros son: Entorno colaborativo: poder ampliar tus habilidades al colaborar con un equipo diverso de personas altamente talentosas en un entorno abierto y relajado.Desarrollo profesional: Desarrollamos caminos adaptados a tus talentos individuales a través de intercambios de conocimientos y oportunidades de certificación profesional.Excelentes beneficios: Brindamos a nuestros empleados beneficios de ley, bonificación anual, bono de desempeño, cobertura de almuerzo en % en nuestra cafeteria, día libre por cumpleaño, semana de la salud, parqueo, entre otros.Beneficios divertidos: Queremos que te sientas cómodo en tu trabajo, es por eso que creamos un buen ambiente de trabajo entretenido, organizamos actividades sociales y de trabajo en equipo.
Objetivo del puesto: Nuestro SOFTWARE ENGINEER II Brindará mantenimiento y soporte a código pre-existente en multiples sistemas de nuestros clientes, asi como analizará requerimientos y convertirá los mismos en soluciones para websites y aplicativos reactivos de la empresa, conectados al backend de los clientes.Deberá brindar soporte a otros programadores en el proceso de Code review, analisis de requerimientos y arquitectura de software y por último, participará en el ciclo completo del desarrollo de aplicaciones tanto para la capa de Frontend como Backend.Requisitos:
Capacidad avanzada en desarrollo de backend para websites y/o aplicaciones WEB:* Lenguaje PHP 7.2.* Conocimiento de multiples frameworks para backend PHP (Wordpress con ACF, Laravel, Code Igniter, October CMS)* Conocimientos avanzados de sistemas de paquetes para PHP (Composer).* Conocimientos de filosofias/principios de programacion como SOLID, MVC, Decoupling of components, etc.* Conocimientos de diseño de arquitectura de software.* Programación orientada a TDD (Test Driven Development).* Capacidad avanzada en desarrollo de frontend para websites y/o aplicaciones WEB:* Conocimientos avanzados HTML 5.* Conocimientos avanzados CSS.* Conocimientos de al menos un pre procesador de estilos (LESS, SCSS, Stylus)* Conocimientos avanzados Javascript.* Conocimientos de al menos un framework reactivo (ReactJS, VueJS, Angular)* Conocimiento básico/medio de tecnologias de base de datos relacionales:* MySQL* PostgreSQL* BigQuery* RedShift* Conocimiento basico/medio de lineamientos de seguridad orientados a software:* XSS* CSRF* SQL Injection* Competencias avanzadas en el uso de herramientas que asistan en el ciclo de desarrollo:* Linux OS* Shell scripting* CLI applications* VSCode* Git   Competencias profesionales: AutodirigidoAutodidáctaTrabajo en equipoCapacidad de InnovacionCreatividadPensamiento criticoOrientacion al clienteLiderazgo en redGestion de la información  Si quieres ser nuestro próximo SOFTWARE ENGINEER II (Full Stack PHP Senior Developer) APLICA AHORA!

title:
Remote C# Developer – Intermediate+ Independiente
Remoto
description:
Join the world’s largest virtual ­­company!
Work from anywhere – Flexible hours
 
Scopic Software is seeking a Remote C# Developer to join our team of 250+ professionals across 40 countries. The successful candidate would work with a team of advanced software engineers on an ordering and billing system involving microservices, distributed systems, APIs, messaging, horizontal scaling, Docker, and .Net core.
 
At Scopic, we believe great developers can be found in every corner of the globe, and talent shouldn’t be limited by location. Our employees work in nearly every time zone, from whenever they feel most comfortable, and our software benefits from this diversity of perspectives and expertise.
 
Develop Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your Success
All Scopic projects involve working with challenging, innovative applications. When you work with us, you will not just be maintaining old code or wasting time on applications that will never see the light of day. The applications Scopic develops are the cornerstone of our clients’ businesses. Clients and users will rely on you to write quality code and keep mission-critical applications running optimally.
 
Grow Your Skills and Your Career, Fast
We offer training opportunities to keep your skills sharp and encourage you to stay up-to-date with ever-evolving technologies. As your skills grow, you will have opportunities to move up in the company. If you work hard and deliver quality results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and promotions are completely merit-based, so your success is in your hands.
 
Become a Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International Team
Unlike huge tech corporations like Google and Microsoft, Scopic employees don’t get lost in bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring tasks day after day. Most projects last six months to one year, so our developers have the opportunity to try their skills on a diverse range of applications. Scopic programmers work independently and are entrusted with considerable responsibility.
 
Why Work With Scopic Software?

Flexible working hours, set your own schedule
Freedom to travel and work from anywhere in the world
Ability to work wherever you are most comfortable (home, office, park, café, etc.)
Reliable, consistent workload
Flexible payment options in $US – salaried and hourly positions available
Annual pay increases for good performance
Paid training and other professional growth opportunities
International travel opportunities (not required)
Interesting, challenging projects using the latest technologies

 
Requirements:
·         3+ years of experience with C# / .Net Core programming
·         Experience with microservices / distributed systems, including containers
·         API creation and management experience – REST / GraphQL / GRPC
·         Ability to attend daily Scrum meetings from 9-9:30am (GMT-8)
·         Good English skills – esp. reading and writing
·         Bachelor's degree or higher
·         Stable internet connection and home computer
 
Preferred Skills (desired but not required):
·         Experience with pub/sub messaging
·         Front-end JavaScript programming skills

Experience with React, Angular, or Vue.js

 
 
Salary: $12 – $20 USD/hour depending on location, skills, and experience. 
This is a full-time, home-based position. 
 
Please apply online:  https://scopicsoftware.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0jrkj?cjb_hash=O_KYQN48&apply_now=true
 
About Scopic Software
Scopic Software is the world’s largest virtual company. Founded in 2006, we have grown consistently by delivering innovative, cutting-edge software products for our clients and creating an empowering environment for our employees.
 
We build advanced software for clients and users around the globe. With 10+ years in the industry and 1000+ projects under our belt, we’ve developed software for Manufacturing, Media and Entertainment, Fintech, Healthcare, Food and Fitness, and Gaming. Check out our development work on our portfolio: scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/.
 
Learn more about career opportunities at Scopic: scopicsoftware.com/careers.

title:
Software Project Manager Independiente
Remoto
description:
Start a career with the world’s largest virtual company!

Work from anywhere – Flexible hours – Training & travel opportunities
 
Scopic Software is seeking a skilled Software Project Manager to join our team of 250+ professionals across 40 countries.
At Scopic, we believe great project managers can be found in every corner of the globe, and talent shouldn’t be limited by location. Our employees work in nearly every time zone, from whenever they feel most comfortable, and our software benefits from this diversity of perspectives and expertise.
 
We are looking for a talented project manager, that is detail oriented. The right candidate will work with small teams to build industry-leading applications with the latest technologies. You will be responsible for managing complex software applications.
 
 
Develop Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your Success
All Scopic projects are challenging, innovative applications. When you work with us, you will not just be wasting time on applications that will never see the light of day. The applications Scopic develops are the cornerstone of our clients’ businesses. Clients and users will rely on you to keep mission-critical applications running optimally.
 
Grow Your Skills and Your Career, Fast
We offer training opportunities to keep your skills sharp and encourage you to stay up-to-date with ever-evolving technologies. As your skills grow, you will have opportunities to move up in the company. If you work hard and deliver quality results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and promotions are completely merit-based, so your success is in your hands.
 
Become a Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International Team
Unlike huge tech corporations like Google and Microsoft, Scopic employees don’t get lost in bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring tasks day after day. Most projects last six months to one year, so you will have the opportunity to try their skills on a diverse range of applications. Scopic project managers work independently and are entrusted with considerable responsibility.
 
Why Work With Scopic Software?
·         Flexible working hours, set your own schedule
·         Freedom to travel and work from anywhere in the world
·         Ability to work wherever you are most comfortable (home, office, park, café, etc.)
·         Reliable, consistent workload
·         Flexible payment options – salaried and hourly positions available
·         Annual pay increases for good performance
·         Paid training and other professional growth opportunities
·         International travel opportunities (not required)
·         Interesting, challenging projects using the latest technologies
 
Requirements
·         2+ years working as a software project manager
·         Strong English reading, writing, and speaking skills
·         Very good communication skills, with the ability to work directly with clients and development teams
·         Ability to read and write software application specifications
·         A good sense of software user interface design and ability to create quick wireframe mockups
·         Knowledge of the software quality assurance process
·         Experience with project management software tools (e.g., scheduling software, and bug trackers)
·         Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
·         Energy and passion for your work
·         Bachelor's degree or higher, preferred
·         Stable internet connection and home computer
·         Interest, dedication, and discipline to work remotely from home
 
 
Salary: $12 – $18 USD/hour depending on skills and experience. 
Full-time and part-time positions available. 
Employees are paid monthly via wire transfer.
 
About Scopic Software
Scopic Software is the world’s largest virtual company. Founded in 2006, we have grown consistently by delivering innovative, cutting-edge software products for our clients and creating an empowering environment for our employees.
 
We build advanced software for clients and users around the globe. With 10+ years in the industry and 1000+ projects under our belt, we’ve developed software for Manufacturing, Media and Entertainment, Fintech, Healthcare, Food and Fitness, and Gaming. Check out our development work on our portfolio: scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/.
 Please apply online:  https://scopicsoftware.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0ftm2?cjb_hash=O_NgVA70&apply_now=true
 Learn more about career opportunities at Scopic: scopicsoftware.com/careers. Have a specific question about this position? Contact us at jobs@scopicsoftware.com.

title:
Remote Software Operations Manager Independiente
Remoto
description:
Join the world’s largest virtual ­­company!
Work from anywhere – Flexible hours – Training & travel opportunities
 
Scopic Software is seeking a skilled Remote Software Operations Manager to join our team of 250+ professionals in over 40 countries. We are looking for a proactive, driven professional we can trust with the rigorous task of ensuring our projects are running as effectively and efficiently as possible. This is a full-time, home-based position.
 
The Operations Manager will work with a co-manager to provide guidance to project managers, put out fires before they start, collaborate with all departments to ensure seamless coordination, and ultimately contribute to the strategic development of the company’s day-to-day operations. This is an ideal position for motivated individuals looking for a diverse, fast-paced, fully remote environment.
 
Responsibilities: 

Support and monitor the onboarding of new projects to ensure clients’ expectations are met
Monitor active projects to identify and prevent risks, ensure effective implementation and timely delivery within project budgets
Work with resource management to optimize project personnel assignments
Address concerns escalated by either project managers or clients
Interview, hire, train, manage, mentor and evaluate project managers
Perform day to day tasking and management of assistant operations managers
Manage client contracts, including management of rate increases
Liaise with Accounting/Finance to assess and improve project profitability
Work with HR on performance reviews and associated operational actions
Suggest and implement SDLC and other process improvements
Work effectively with the Director of Engineering and other technical personnel to troubleshoot technical challenges and enhance technical workflows

Successful candidates will be:

Skilled in the English language, especially writing
Comfortable with self-organization, prioritization and multi-tasking in a dynamic environment
Independently motivated self-starters with strong work ethic
Industrious and energetic
Detail-oriented but still able to see the big picture
Diplomatic but able to provide direct feedback when it is needed
Receptive to constructive feedback and interested in growth and self-improvement
Able to manage stress with a positive attitude, even in challenging situations
Perceptive and understanding, able to communicate clearly and professionally
Highly adept at detecting and preventing risks and solving problems
Ready to jump into tasks and do whatever is needed

 
The right candidate will work with a team of skilled professionals from around the world to keep the company running smoothly and efficiently.

 

 
At Scopic, we believe talent can be found in every corner of the globe, and you shouldn’t be limited by location. Our employees work in nearly every time zone, from whenever they feel most comfortable, and our software benefits from this diversity of perspectives and expertise.
 
Grow Your Skills and Your Career, Fast
We offer training opportunities to keep your skills sharp and encourage you to stay up-to-date with ever-evolving technologies. As your skills grow and you take on additional responsibility, you will have opportunities to move up in the company. If you work hard and deliver quality results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and promotions are completely merit-based, so your success is in your hands.
 
Become a Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International Team
Unlike huge tech corporations like Google and Microsoft, Scopic employees don’t get lost in bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring tasks day after day. Most projects last six months to one year, so all team members have the opportunity to try their skills on a diverse range of applications. Scopic employees work independently and are entrusted with considerable responsibility.
 
Contribute to Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your Success
All Scopic projects involve working with challenging, innovative applications. The applications Scopic works on are the cornerstone of our clients’ businesses. Clients and users will rely on you to ensure the delivery of quality software products.
 
Why Work With Scopic Software?

Flexible working hours, set your own schedule
Freedom to travel and work from anywhere in the world
Ability to work wherever you are most comfortable (home, office, park, café, etc.)
Reliable, consistent workload
Flexible payment options in $US – salaried and hourly positions available
Annual pay increases for good performance
Paid training and other professional growth opportunities
International travel opportunities (not required)
Interesting, challenging projects using the latest technologies

 
Required Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in a business or technical field, Master’s degree preferred
1+ years of experience in full-cycle software project management
Strong knowledge of the SDLC and how software applications are created
Familiarity with creating specs and wireframes for software projects
Excellent English communication skills, both verbal and written
Demonstrated leadership skills and the aptitude to learn new skills quickly
Demonstrated risk and client management expertise
Excellent computer skills and proficiency in Microsoft Office
Basic technical knowledge and/or experience in the IT industry

Salary: Negotiable depending on skills and experience. Hourly and salary positions available. Employees are paid monthly via wire transfer.
 
Please apply online:  https://scopicsoftware.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0jpwh?cjb_hash=O_OZtY65&apply_now=true
 
Have questions about this position? Contact us at jobs@scopicsoftware.com.
 
About Scopic Software
Scopic Software is the world’s largest virtual company. Founded in 2006, we have grown consistently by delivering innovative, cutting-edge software and marketing services to our clients and creating an empowering environment for our employees.
 
We build and market advanced software for clients and users around the globe. With 10+ years in the industry and 1000+ projects under our belt, we’ve brought to life software for Manufacturing, Media and Entertainment, Fintech, Healthcare, Food and Fitness, and Gaming. Check out our work on our portfolio: scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/.
 
Learn more about career opportunities at Scopic: scopicsoftware.com/careers.

Remote Senior Web Developer
 
Start a career with the world's largest virtual company!
Work from anywhere - Flexible hours - Training & travel opportunities
Scopic Software is seeking a skilled Remote Senior Web  Developer  to join our team of 250+ professionals across 40 countries.
 
At Scopic, we believe great developers can be found in every corner of the globe, and talent should not be limited by location. Our employees work in almost every time zone, from where they feel most comfortable, and our software benefits from this diversity of perspectives and expertise.
 
We are looking for a talented developer, who does not shy away from complex problems. The right candidate will work with a small team of advanced software engineers to build industry-leading applications with the latest technologies. As a developer, you will be responsible for building complex software applications. These are some of the technologies and skills you can find using: C ++, Java, OpenGL, Vue.js, Magento, C #, Python, OpenCV, Bootstrap, Ionic, Swift, ASP.NET, CUDA, Yii, ReactNative, HTML5, Node.js, Angular, Symfony, Xamarin, PHP, React, Django, Qt, MySQL, Blockchain, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, 3D, AR / VR.
 
Develop Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your Success
All Scopic projects are challenging, innovative applications. When you work with us, you will not be keeping old code or wasting time on applications that will never see the light of day. The applications Scope develops at the cornerstone of our clients' businesses. Clients and users will rely on you to write quality code and keep mission-critical applications running optimally.
 
Grow Your Skills and Your Career, Fast
We offer training opportunities to keep your skills sharp and encourage you to stay up-to-date with ever-evolving technologies. As your skills grow, you will have opportunities to move up in the company. If you work hard and deliver quality results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and promotions are completely merit-based, so your success is in your hands.
 
Become a Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International Team
Unlike huge tech corporations like Google and Microsoft, employees do not get lost in bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring tasks day after day. Most projects last six months to one year, so our developers have the opportunity to try their skills in a diverse range of applications. Scopic programmers work independently and are entrusted with considerable responsibility.
 
Why Work With Scopic Software?

Flexible working hours, set your own schedule
Freedom to travel and work from anywhere in the world
Ability to work wherever you are most comfortable (home, office, park, coffee, etc.)
Reliable, consistent workload
Flexible payment options in $ US - salaried and hourly positions available
Annual pay increases for good performance
Paid training and other professional growth opportunities
International travel opportunities (not required)
Interesting, challenging projects using the latest technologies

 
Requirements:
· 3+ years of software development experience
· Excellent back-end and front-end programming skills
· Architecture design skills (writing / reading technical specs, UML diagrams, etc.)
· Proficiency in two or more of the following programming languages (eg, JavaScript, PHP, C #, Ruby, Python)
· Strong experience with frameworks and libraries (eg, jQuery, AngularJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, Laravel, ect.)ect.)
· Know and follow best practices for the technologies you work with
· Proficiency in SQL (eg, MySQL) and NoSQL (eg, MongoDB) databases
· Experience implementing modern user interfaces
· Experience developing multi-tiered scalable and secure web applications
· Problem-solving skills
 
Skills (optional):

Desire to learn additional programming languages
Experience with audio and video programming
Experience with Amazon Services
Ability to deliver successful products and guide to development team
Ability to create test plans

 
Other Requirements:

Strong English reading, writing, and speaking skills.
Bachelor's degree or higher
Stable internet connection and home computer.
Dedication and discipline to work remotely from home.

 
Salary : $ 18- $ 24 per hour depending on skills and experience.
Part-time and full-time positions available. 
 
Please apply online: https://scopicsoftware.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0fam3?cjb_hash=O_dXIt26&apply_now=true
 
About Scopic Software
Scopic Software is the world's largest virtual company. Founded in 2006, we have grown consistently by delivering innovative, cutting-edge software products for our clients and creating an empowering environment for our employees.
 
We build advanced software for clients and users around the globe. With 10+ years in the industry and 1000+ projects under our belt, we've developed software for Manufacturing, Media and Entertainment, Fintech, Healthcare, Food and Fitness, and Gaming. Check out our development work on our portfolio: scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/ .
 
Learn more about career opportunities at Scope: scopicsoftware.com/careers .

title: Software Quality Assurance Mid Tiempo Completo
description: GBH is looking for an experienced Mid-level Software Quality Assurance to plan, design, execute and automate tests. We have Agile and waterfall teams so previous experience working in a QA Team in these framework(s) is a must. The Individual chosen for this position should be a hands-on Software QA Analyst with proven technical and analytical skills. If you enjoy a highly collaborative environment, then this position might be for you!Responsibilities Participate in the whole software development lifecycle by reviewing documentation and making sure they meet good quality standards.Direct analysis of documentation and technical specifications for any application under deployment or consideration to determine its intended functionalityPlan tests based on formal and informal documentation by creating well-structured Test Plans.Design tests by creating well detailed Test Cases and Test Scripts.Create more efficient regression testing efforts by automating manual tests.Execute manual tests for front-end and back-end working environments.Report defects, bugs and errors on any application under test.Follow up on reported issues during the bugs lifecycle.Be a mentor for Junior QA staff.Requirements Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or relatedLeadershipAbility to work as a teamExperienceExperience using a variety of software development methodologies (Waterfall, Phase Gate, SCRUM, Kanban, etc.)Experience in modern test automation.1+ years of overall experience delivering enterprise-class software solutionsFamiliarity with bug and feature tracking systems such as JIRA a plus.Experience using a variety of software development methodologies (Waterfall, Phase Gate, SCRUM, Kanban, etc.)Testing environment include a variety of web and mobile solutions that include: React.js, Angular 1 and 2, Java, .NET, PHP, Elixir, Node.js, React Native, Android and IOSEqual opportunitiesThe selection process for this position ensures compliance with the principle of non-discrimination by sex, origin (including racial or ethnic), age, marital status, disability, religion or belief, political opinion, sexual orientation, union affiliation, social status and language.Terms of recruitmentIndefinite employment contractWorking day from Monday to Friday (40 hours a week)Monthly Salary less than RD$ 50,000Great environmentComplementary health insurancePlace of work: Santo Domingo – Sector Naco

title:
Ing. de Software Móvil Senior Tiempo Completo
Remoto
description: DescripciónEl Ingeniero de Software Mobile Senior trabaja como líder en los proyectos mobile de la empresa produciendo código de pruebas y ejecución para diversos proyectos de clientes externos.Objetivos? Producir código de ejecución y de pruebas.? Colaborar en el diseño y la arquitectura de los proyectos.? Ser el mentor de los ingenieros mobile junior y mid-level. Requisitos1. Egresado de grado universitario en ingeniería de sistemas y computación o carrera relacionada, con 3+ años de experiencia desarrollando aplicaciones móviles de tipo empresarial. 2. Debe poder construir soluciones haciendo uso de estructuras de datos simples o complejas. Por ejemplo: arreglos, listas enlazadas, stacks, queues, graphs y trees.3. Conocimiento y capacidad de aplicación de object oriented design; esta persona debe, dado un problema, poder estructurar su solución en clases, métodos y propiedades.4. Debe demostrar que entiende cómo funciona una aplicación movil y como esta se integra con servicios externos o de terceros. Cualquier capacidad demostrada en las tecnologías representadas en estos keywords es un plus: Android, iOS, React Native, Xamarin, Unity3D, Ionic5. Compresión y capacidad de implementación utilizando el paradigma de functional programming un plus.6. Conocimientos sobre estrategias de testing top down y bottom up así cómo su implementación a través de unit testing y/o integration testing un plus.7. Acostumbrado a utilizar herramientas de control de versiones (GIT) un plus.8. Buen dominio del inglés; esta persona debe poder leer libros, documentos técnicos o posts de blogs y comprenderlos. Adicionalmente, debe poder generar un resumen de dicha lectura y mantener una conversación técnica sobre el tema sin dificultad.Igualdad de oportunidadesEl proceso de selección para el presente puesto garantiza el cumplimiento del principio de No-Discriminación por sexo, origen (incluido el racial o étnico), edad, estado civil, discapacidad, religión o convicciones, opinión política, orientación sexual, afiliación sindical, condición social y lengua.Condiciones de contratación? Contrato como prestador de servicios por 1 año. Posibilidad de extensión antes de finalizar cada periodo.? Modalidad de trabajo remota. 40 horas semanales garantizadas con posibilidad de realizar horas extras en caso de ser requeridas por el cliente.? Salario por hora de U$ 15-18 (según experiencia).Las personas interesadas a la presente convocatoria deberán enviar su curriculum vitae vía nuestra Página de Ofertas de Empleo.

strategic goals. As a Resource Management Specialist, your main responsibility
is to assign resources as and when they are needed. 
Your goal is to proactively
engage with our staff to gain a technical understanding of their skills,
experience, and aspirations and to identify the right opportunities for them.
This is an ideal position for motivated individuals who would like to join a
diverse, fast-paced environment. You must enjoy daily communication with
multiple people within the company. If you are a former developer that enjoys
talking with people and wants to be involved in the business side of the
software industry, this is the role for you.

description:

comunicativo!

crecer, y colaborar con nosotros.

El rol de Senior
Software Engineer tiene como objetivo principal el desarrollar,
implementar y gestionar soluciones tecnológicas por medio de la escritura y
pruebas de código, asegurando el cumplimiento de los requerimientos y

     requerido.

     apoyo y soporte al equipo de ingenieros junior.
Desarrollar
     y entrenar a empleados con menos experiencia.
Contribuir
     en las sesiones de crecimiento de Agile.

Ingeniero (a) carrera STEM. (Science,
     Technology, Engineering, Mathematics).

C# + Entity Framework + LINQ, HTML + CSS/Sass, SQL Server, SQL Management Studio,

5 años
     de experiencia en programación.

     en realización de pruebas de código y de QA.
Experiencia
     laborando con metodología Ágil. (+)

Responsabilidad
Solución de Problemas

Colaboración

Ética Profesional

title:
Remote Inside Sales Representative - Software / IT Medio tiempo
Remoto
description: Start a career with the world's largest virtual company while you're still in school! Work from anywhere - Flexible hours - Training & travel opportunities The company is looking to hire a Remote Inside Sales Representative - Software / IT to join our team of 250+ professionals across 40 countries. Our future employee will work with our sales team to help us continue to grow our software services. You will report to management, who will provide support and supervise all activities. At Scopic, we believe great employees can be found in every corner of the globe, and talent should not be limited by location. Our employees work in almost every time zone, from where they feel most comfortable, and our software benefits from this diversity of perspectives and expertise.Grow Your Skills and Your Career, Fast We offer training opportunities to keep your skills sharp and encourage you to stay up-to-date with ever-evolving technologies. As your skills grow, you will have opportunities to move up in the company. If you work hard and deliver quality results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and promotions are completely merit-based, so your success is in your hands. Become a Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International TeamUnlike huge tech corporations like Google and Microsoft, employees do not get lost in bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring tasks day after day. Most projects last six months to one year, so our developers have the opportunity to try their skills in a diverse range of applications. Scopic programmers work independently and are entrusted with considerable responsibility. Develop Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your SuccessAll Scopic projects are challenging, innovative applications. When you work with us, you will not be keeping old code or wasting time on applications that will never see the light of day. The applications Scope develops at the cornerstone of our clients' businesses. Clients and users will rely on you to write quality code and keep mission-critical applications running optimally. Why Work With Scopic Software?    Flexible working hours, set your own schedule    Freedom to travel and work from anywhere in the world    Ability to work wherever you are most comfortable (home, office, park, coffee, etc.)    Reliable, consistent workload    Flexible payment options in $ US - salaried and hourly positions available   Annual pay increases for good performance    Paid training and other professional growth opportunities    International travel opportunities (not required)    Interesting, challenging projects using the latest technologies Responsibilities:    Learn what services the company can provide and use that knowledge to initiate daily activities that will generate relevant sales leads    Working directly with our clients and project managers to up-sell and maximize our revenue per account.    Directly communication with potential new clients to understand requirements and assess opportunities.    Proactively pursue and prospect new business opportunities in support of sales goals and objectives.   Establish new channels and partnerships. Work with management on overall sales strategy.    Lead generation and prospecting for new customers by networking, cold calling, advertising, bidding in online IT marketplaces, or working any other relevant channels.    Possess a deep understanding of target client profiles as they relate to sales and marketing objectives.    Work diligently and creatively to turn opportunities into actual projects.    Work with operations, engineering, and marketing as needed. Qualifications:    Work experience 2+ years in lead generation and sales.    Demonstrated sales record.    Must be tech-savvy and have knowledge of the IT / Software industry.   Strategic and analytical skills as they pertain to sales strategies and operations.    Communication and Interpersonal skills both written and verbal.    A doer that takes initiative and ownership.    Excellent attention to detail.    Overall knowledge of marketing is a plus.    Personality traits necessary to excel in sales (positive, ambitious, gregarious, flexible, self-sufficient).    Must be independent and disciplined to work remotely.    Advanced English skills verbal and written.    Bachelor's or Master's degree.    Evening working availability.Salary: $ 15 - $ 22 per hour, depending on skills and experience. Full-time and part-time positions available. Employees are paid monthly via wire transfer. About Scopic Software Scopic Software is the world's largest virtual company. Founded in 2006, we have grown consistently by delivering innovative, cutting-edge software products for our clients and creating an empowering environment for our employees. We build advanced software for clients and users around the globe. With 10+ years in the industry and 1000+ projects under our belt, we've developed software for Manufacturing, Media and Entertainment, Fintech, Healthcare, Food and Fitness, and Gaming. Check out our development work on our portfolio: scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/.Learn more about career opportunities at Scope: scopicsoftware.com/careers. Have a specific question about this position? Contact us at jobs@scopicsoftware.com.

title:
Remote Marketing Specialist Independiente
Remoto
description:
This is a remote,
home-based position. 
Start a career with the
world’s largest virtual company.
Flexible, stable hours -
Your own space to grow - Competitive compensation.
 
About us
At Scopic Software, we
have over 250 employees in over 30 countries all comfortably working from
home/remotely. Though we’re a big team overall, each project is made up of
small teams to remain agile and maintain good communication. As a
skilled Marketing Specialist, you would be part of a dedicated team for
digital marketing client projects and internal ones and an integral part of
Scopic.
Since a good work
environment is crucial to creativity, the position gives you the freedom to
work from anywhere, at any time. We value and respect every member of our team
and encourage transparency in all areas of our work.
 
Job Description
We are seeking a Marketing Specialist to join our dynamic team and be a
proactive, creative, self-starter that requires limited guidance but welcomes
input. You will be responsible for developing and executing marketing
strategies for ours and our clients' software services and products. Products
can range from cloud-based platforms to mobile and desktop applications.
 As a Marketing Specialist, some of your tasks will include most of the
digital marketing activities such as:
 
·        
Written content creation (copywriting for landing
pages/websites, blog posts, articles, social media posts, and ads, etc),
·        
Client software products marketing research and planning,
liaising with clients
·        
Strategy, creation, and launch of AdWords campaigns
·        
Social media strategies, posting and advertising
·        
Media outreach efforts
·        
Email marketing campaigns and others
The type of
projects/tasks you might work on include:
·        
Mobile applications in different type of niches
·        
E-commerce businesses
·        
SaaS solutions
·        
Website and web applications
·        
Lead generation for Scopic (B2B)
·        
Recruitment marketing
 
You will be working on
several products/projects at the same time, the ability to multi-task will be
an important part of this position. The projects will also be quite different
from one another as domain, platform, life stage and other specifics and this
will require flexibility and the possibility to adapt quickly.
 
Job requirements 
·        
2+ years of experience working in marketing and digital
marketing, preferably with software services or products
·        
Excellent English skills both written and verbal
·        
Copywriting skills, preferably writing to sell, content creation
and some technical writing
·        
Intermediate understanding and knowledge of the IT &
software industry
·        
Experience in lead generation through marketing activities
·        
Expertise in creating and using email campaign software (e.g.,
MailChimp or SendGrid)
·        
Experience planning, creating, and optimizing targeted
advertising campaigns using social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Twitter,
LinkedIn)
·        
Understanding of SEO principles, activities and their
application in practice
 
Other requirements
·        
Digital Marketing portfolio
·        
Stable internet connection and home computer
·        
Dedication and discipline to work remotely from home
·        
Ability to make right connections and multitask, analytical
skills are a plus
·        
Bachelor's degree or higher
 
Benefits of working with
Scopic Software
·        
Work your own hours
·        
No commute
·        
Competitive salary based on your personal skills and experience
·        
Performance reviews and compensation increase
·        
Salaried or hourly positions
·        
Well established internal procedures, documented processes,
internal tools
·        
Interesting and challenging projects
·        
Paid training & other professional growth activities
·        
Open communication to all levels of the company
·        
Local meetups with Scopic colleagues
 
What we do
Custom solutions for
virtually everything. We have over a decade of service in the software industry
and 1000+ projects under our belt, developing digital products and user-centric
software for a wide range of industries and niches including: Manufacturing, Media &
Entertainment, Fintech, Retail, Medical, Food and Fitness, and Gaming.
Scopic Software has grown
consistently since 2006 and continues to strive to make an impact in the
software industry. Today, it is the largest virtual company in the world,
employing top talent globally.
Our clients are mostly
located in North America and Europe.
These are some of the
technologies and skills you can find us using: C++, Java, OpenGL, Vue.js,
Magento, C#, Python, OpenCV, Bootstrap, Ionic, Swift, ASP.NET, CUDA, Yii ,
ReactNative, HTML5, Node.js, Angular, Symfony, Xamarin, PHP, React, Django, Qt,
MySQL, Blockchain, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, 3D, AR/VR.
To find out more about our projects and
technologies used please feel free to check out our portfolio: https://scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/
 
This is a remote, part-time
or full-time position.
Hourly rate range is
$10-$18 depending on skills and experience.

title:
Remote Resource Management Specialist Independiente
Remoto
description:
Start a career with
the world’s largest virtual company!

Work from
anywhere – Flexible hours – Training & travel opportunities
 
About the Role 
Scopic Software is
seeking a Remote Resource Management Specialist to join our team of 250+
professionals across 40 countries.
 
We are looking for
passionate, dynamic professionals to join our Resource Management team.
Resource Management's mission is to assign the right people to the right
projects at the right time, develop our employees, and support Scopic's
strategic goals. As a Resource Management Specialist, your main responsibility
is to assign resources as and when they are needed. 
Your goal is to proactively
engage with our staff to gain an understanding of their skills, experience, and
aspirations and to identify the right opportunities for them. This is an ideal
position for motivated individuals who would like to join a diverse, fast-paced
environment. You must enjoy daily communication with multiple people within the
company. 
 
At Scopic, we
believe great employees can be found in every corner of the globe, and talent
shouldn’t be limited by location. Our employees work in nearly every time zone,
from whenever they feel most comfortable, and our software benefits from this
diversity of perspectives and expertise. Join us from any
 
Grow Your
Skills and Your Career, Fast
We offer training
opportunities to keep your skills sharp and encourage you to stay up-to-date
with ever-evolving technologies. As your skills grow, you will have
opportunities to move up in the company. If you work hard and deliver quality
results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and promotions are completely
merit-based, so your success is in your hands.
 
Become a
Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International Team
Unlike huge tech
corporations like Google and Microsoft, Scopic employees don’t get lost in
bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring tasks day after day. Most
projects last six months to one year, so our developers have the opportunity to
try their skills on a diverse range of applications. Scopic programmers work
independently and are entrusted with considerable responsibility.
 
Develop
Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your Success

Implementar front-ends será una gran parte de la función de trabajo.Esta posición reportará directamente a nuestro product manager y trabajará estrechamente con nuestros otros ingenieros, y estamos buscando a alguien que pueda crecer con nuestros productos en los años venideros.RequisitosPasión, disciplina, y mostrar trabajos realizados.Eres buen candidato si:Eres auto disciplinado y tienes ética profesionalTienes buen manejo del tiempoSabes comunicarteTienes por lo menos 3 proyectos que demuestren tus habilidadesRequisitos en el área de diseño de productos:Diseño de Interfaces de Usuarios y WireframesExperiencia con interfaces web y móvilesConocimientos de usabilidad/User ExperienceRedacción de documentos de especificacionesRequisitos en el área de front-end:Crear módulos web completamente funcionalesHTMl/CSSJavaScriptBootStrapjQueryControl de versiones con GITExperiencia utilizando API’s RESTFULResponsive DesignBonosTDDVueJs, React, Angular, etc…Sass*No requiere experiencia laboral previa, pero sí proyectos realizados o que haya participado de manera activa.*Este es un trabajo a tiempo completo.*Preferiblemente egresados de desarrollo web, ingeniería en sistemas, diseño gráfico, y/o carreras afines.

title: Project Manager Tiempo Completo
description: OBJETIVOS PRINCIPALES DEL PUESTO:Planificar y dirigir los proyectos asignados durante todo su ciclo de vida.Mantener una comunicación activa con los stakeholders del proyecto.Garantizar la satisfacción del cliente a través del cumplimiento de las expectativas y objetivos del proyecto.Disminuir las incertidumbres que puedan surgir durante la gestión del proyectoServir como ente mediador entre todas las partes involucradas en el proyecto.REQUERIMIENTOS Y FUNCIONES DEL PUESTO:Educación y experiencia necesaria:Egresado o estudiante de término de Ingeniería Industria, Ingeniera en Sistemas o carreras afines.3 o más años de experiencia en roles o posiciones de trabajo similares.Dominio avanzado del Inglés.Certificación CAPM o PMP (Preferible).Experiencia utilizando herramientas de manejo de proyectos como: Microsoft Project, Asana, JIRA, Trello, Zoho Projects o similares.Experiencia trabajando con SCRUM y metodologías Ágiles de desarrollo de software.Habilidades técnicas necesarias:Idiomas:Dominio intermedio del inglés, capaz de leer y escribir textos técnicos.Dominio avanzado del español, excelente comunicación y ortografía.Otras tecnologías y servicios planes de trabajo.Velar por el cumplimiento de planes y entrega a tiempo.Gestionar la disponibilidad de los colaboradores durante su participación en el proyecto.Actualizar el dashboard de proyectos para el comité de operaciones.Actualizar el dashboard de Gestión de proyectos en el área al que pertenece el proyecto.Actualizar documentos de Gestión de proyectos.Gestionar la comunicación con el cliente y cada uno de los interesados en el proyecto.Actuar como canal de comunicación entre el equipo y el cliente.Entender y transmitir a sus colaboradores la cultura, valores y contexto del cliente interno / externo para facilitar las relaciones con sus interlocutores.Delegar tareas a realizar del proyecto conforme a habilidades del equipo.Anticipar soluciones y resolver problemáticas surgidas en el transcurso del proyecto.Analizar la documentación y reportes que pertenecen al proyecto con la finalidad de evaluar la evolución del proyecto e informar a los interesados.IGUALDAD DE OPORTUNIDADES:El proceso de selección para el presente puesto garantiza el cumplimiento del principio de No-discriminación por sexo, origen (incluido racial o étnico), edad, estado civil, discapacidad, religión o convicciones, opinión política, orientación sexual, afiliación sindical, condición social y lengua.CONDICIONES DE CONTRATACIÓN:Contrato laboral por tiempo indefinidoJornada laboral de lunes a viernes (40 horas semanales)Salario bruto mensual según escala salarial (inferior a RD$ 65,000)Otros beneficios: Seguro complementario de Salud

software for clients and users around the globe. With 10+ years in the industry
and 1000+ projects under our belt, we’ve developed software for Manufacturing,
Media and Entertainment, Fintech, Healthcare, Food and Fitness, and Gaming.
Check out our development work on our portfolio: scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/.

online:  https://scopicsoftware.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk01cmo?cjb_hash=O_CZVB51&apply_now=true

title: DevOps Engineer Tiempo Completo
description: Newtech, SRL. is looking for a DevOps Engineer.As a DevOps Engineer, you will be working in an Agile-based IT development environment. Among your responsibilities you will be:Deployment of solutions for different IT projects.Managing source code of TFS-based projects. Making improvements to existing applications. Participating in status management meetings. Use PowerShell scripts to automate deployments and tasks. Providing verbal and written reports of continuous feedback from management Troubleshoot deployment issues for different applicationsSome of the skills we're expecting from you:Basic/Intermediate hands on experience with C#/.NETBasic experience working with Relational Databases, such as Oracle, SQL Server, etc.Version control systems (TFS, Git)Knowledge of Web Services/API'sWindows server administrationKnowledge of JSON and/or XMLOther "must-have" qualifications:Self-motivated, organized, teamwork abilityExcellent oral and written communication skills (in English)Able to debug app issuesProblem solverStrong analytical skillsSome of the benefits we'll provide you:Life insurance.Royal complementary health insurance.SIM assignment with data package (10GB) and (100) minutes.Food Subside, through the Fripick platform:it covers ITBIS (18%) + additional moneyGift Card RD$1,000 in Fripick.Paid basketball club.Annual bonus for performance.Payment of certifications.Referral bonus.?If you meet some of the above listed requirements (or if you thing you're the right candidate for this position), send your resume to: carlos_parra_sbr@hotmail.com

mission critical enterprise application to be used by hundreds of users throughout
the Caribbean and we have a position available. The application currently has a
Windows Desktop frontend and a Web and Mobile frontends are on the pipeline for
development. We are looking for a Database Administrator with the following
qualifications:

Fluent in English.
·        
4 or more years of experience administering
Microsoft SQL Databases

3 or more years of experience developing
Microsoft SQL Server DDL and DML scripts.
·        
Experience analyzing issues from the application
tier to database.
·        
Familiar with agile project management (e.g.
scrum).
Knowledge of the following are a plus
·        
Knowledge of VSTS/TFS an Git.
·        
Intermediate knowledge of Accounting.
·        
Experience developing software in the Insurance
industry.
·        
Experience in writing Shell scripts
·        
ETL experience with data warehousing is a huge
plus
·        
Having excellent communication skills, written,
verbal and interpersonal

DETAILS
Backend
Engineer
The
opportunity
Joining
the Developemt Engineering team (squads) at Tech and People is an opportunity
to help shape the future of our company.
 What
can you expect from us?
·        
We’ll believe and trust in you and your abilities. You and your team
will have the authority to make the technical decisions you need to meet your
responsibilities.

title:
Remote C++/Math/Algorithm Developer Tiempo Completo
Remoto
description:
Start a career with the world's largest virtual company!
Work from anywhere - Flexible hours - Training & travel opportunities
 
Scopic Software is seeking skilled C ++ / Math / Algorithm Developer to join our team of 250+ professionals across 40 countries.

 
At Scopic, we believe great developers can be found in every corner of the globe, and talent should not be limited by location. Our employees work in almost every time zone, from where they feel most comfortable, and our software benefits from this diversity of perspectives and expertise.
 
We are looking for a talented algorithmic thinker, who does not shy away from complex problems. The right candidate will work with a small team of advanced software engineers to build industry-leading applications with the latest technologies. As a C ++ / Math / Algorithm Developer, you will be responsible for building complex software applications, utilizing technologies such as image processing and analysis , video analytics ,
  machine learning , signal and audio processing , and 2D / 3D geometric algorithms . 
 
Develop Meaningful Applications for Clients Invested in Your Success
All Scopic projects are challenging, innovative applications. When you work with us, you will not be keeping old code or wasting time on applications that will never see the light of day. The applications Scope develops at the cornerstone of our clients' businesses. Clients and users will rely on you to write quality code and keep mission-critical applications running optimally.
 
Grow Your Skills and Your Career, Fast
We offer training opportunities to keep your skills sharp and encourage you to stay up-to-date with ever-evolving technologies. As your skills grow, you will have opportunities to move up in the company. If you work hard and deliver quality results, you will do very well here. Pay raises and promotions are completely merit-based, so your success is in your hands.
 
Become a Valuable Part of a Small, Dynamic International Team
Unlike huge tech corporations like Google and Microsoft, employees do not get lost in bureaucracy or sidelined doing the same boring tasks day after day. Most projects last six months to one year, so our developers have the opportunity to try their skills in a diverse range of applications. Scopic programmers work independently and are entrusted with considerable responsibility.
 
Why Work With Scopic Software?
    Flexible working hours, set your own schedule
    Freedom to travel and work from anywhere in the world
    Ability to work wherever you are most comfortable (home, office, park, coffee, etc.)
    Reliable, consistent workload
    Flexible payment options in $ US - salaried and hourly positions available
    Annual pay increases for good performance
    Paid training and other professional growth opportunities
    International travel opportunities (not required)
    Interesting, challenging projects using the latest technologies
 
Requirements
    2+ years working in software development
    Strong C ++ programming skills
    Strong math and algorithm skills
    Ability to communicate in English (training available)
    Bachelor's degree or higher
    Experience with one or more of the following:
 Qt framework
 Signal, audio, or speech processing / analysis
 Image processing / analysis Video processing / analysis
 Machine learning
 2D / 3D geometric algorithms
 
Salary : $ 15 - $ 25 USD / hour, depending on skills and experience. Full-time and part-time positions available. Employees are paid monthly via wire transfer.
 
About Scopic Software
Scopic Software is the world's largest virtual company. Founded in 2006, we have grown consistently by delivering innovative, cutting-edge software products for our clients and creating an empowering environment for our employees.
 
We build advanced software for clients and users around the globe. With 10+ years in the industry and 1000+ projects under our belt, we've developed software for Manufacturing, Media and Entertainment, Fintech, Healthcare, Food and Fitness, and Gaming. Check out our development work on our portfolio: scopicsoftware.com/portfolio/ .
 
 Please apply online: https://scopicsoftware.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0mqj3?cjb_hash=O_pFJD28&apply_now=true
